* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $4800.:

  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 3 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8500.:
  * Won Unit Q at $6500 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Mechanism J at $5000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Implement G at $4000 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 6 items in this auction, with a total profit of $12400.:
  * Won Gadget B at $1300 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Appliance O at $4900 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Utensil N at $4600 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Apparatus H at $3800 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Contraption I at $3800 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
